org.trianacode.gui.hci.tools

Class ToolTreeModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.tree.DefaultTreeModel
      • org.trianacode.gui.hci.tools.ToolTreeModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.tree.TreeModel, ToolListener

    public class ToolTreeModel
extends javax.swing.tree.DefaultTreeModel
implements ToolListener
    A model for laying out and updating a tree of tools.
    See Also:
